[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Attack: Sybil via Reputation] Can an attacker create multiple validator identities with low stake but high reputation to dominate leader selection? (High)

[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Attack: Targeted Exclusion] Can Byzantine validators coordinate to ensure specific honest validators always exceed failure_threshold_percent? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Attack: Reputation Reset] During epoch transitions, can attackers exploit the window sliding to reset reputation scores of Byzantine validators? (High)

[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Attack: History Manipulation] Can validators with database write access (corrupted nodes) manipulate NewBlockEvents to alter past reputation? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Attack: Window Sliding] By carefully timing block production, can Byzantine validators ensure their failures slide out of the window before penalization? (High)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Attack: Vote Withholding] Can validators strategically withhold votes to reduce others' reputation while maintaining their own? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Attack: False Failure Attribution] Can the next leader falsely report the previous leader as failed in failed_proposer_indices? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Attack: Chain Health Manipulation] Can Byzantine validators coordinate to artificially inflate or deflate chain health metrics? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Rust: Unwrap Panics] The use of .unwrap() in db_result - can this panic under any production scenario? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Rust: Integer Casting] Multiple 'as' casts (u32 as u64, u64 as u128, etc.) - can any cause truncation or unexpected behavior? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Rust: Lifetimes] The history_iter function returns impl Iterator with complex lifetimes - can lifetime issues cause use-after-free? (Low)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Rust: Send + Sync] The MetadataBackend and ReputationHeuristic traits require Send + Sync - are all implementations actually thread-safe? (High)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Rust: Arc Cloning] Multiple Arc clones of backend and heuristic - can reference counting issues cause memory leaks? (Low)

[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Error: Silent Failures] When bitvec_to_voters() or indices_to_validators() fail, errors are logged but votes/failures dropped - can this be exploited? (High)

[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Error: Database Errors] If aptos_db operations fail, the function returns empty results or HashValue::zero() - can this cause systematic wrong leader election? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Error: Assertion Failures] Multiple assert!() calls can panic - should these be checked at initialization rather than runtime? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Error: BCS Deserialization] If bcs::from_bytes fails for NewBlockEvent, the error is propagated - can malformed events cause consensus halt? (High)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Performance: Database Query Size] Can window_size + seek_len be configured so large that database queries cause validator slowdown? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Performance: Iteration Cost] The history_iter with filtering and folding - can this become expensive with large windows affecting block time? (Low)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Performance: Metric Updates] Frequent metric updates on every round - can this cause lock contention or performance issues? (Low)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Performance: HashMap Resizing] Can frequent HashMap insertions during counting cause excessive allocations and GC pressure? (Low)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Liveness: All Excluded] If reputation system excludes too many validators, can the network fail to achieve quorum for blocks? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Liveness: Stuck Leader] If the elected leader is always the same Byzantine node with failed_weight but highest stake, can this halt consensus? (Critical)
[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Liveness: Database Lag] If validators have significantly different database sync states, can they deadlock on leader election? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/liveness/leader_reputation.rs] [Safety: Non-deterministic Election] Any source of non-determinism in leader election (floating point, HashMap order, race conditions) can break consensus safety guarantees (Critical)
